synopsis.text: This short claymation film explores the importance of cooperation in building meaningful friendships. Created in 2015 by director Iku Ogawa and a creative team of students at Tokyo University of the Arts, it tells the story of a clay figure striving to connect with others. Through the ups and downs, the central message emerges - that being supportive of one another is key for relationships to thrive. The film's heartwarming storyline and charming visual style resonated widely, winning the Audience Award at a major international animation festival that year. With nuanced storytelling and a vital message, this anime rewards viewers with a richer understanding of how we can lift each other up. Its accolades are well-deserved, finding depth and insight in simple moments of everyday human connection.
